channel.title: flyspell on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in flyspell on Barefoot Rob

item.title: Testing flyspell
item.description: 19:18 Saturday 05 December 2015 JST So if I type a word incorretcly, flyspell should fix it. I just now told flyspell to load, and didn’t see any errors, so I 19:44 got a bit sidetracked looking at other options, and realize I don’t even have ispell installed. aspell is apparently better so I was looking at how to install that bah. Maybe I’ll try to get sublime to create journal entry files for me.
